citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:45pm August 24,
2021.
Upon arrival, the licensee was leaving the facility, unavailable for an inspection that day.
End Section
